A Vin Diesel character vs a Stan Lee character could go either way, depending on how one-sided you wanted to make it.  You could always pitch Betty Brant vs Riddick, which would put the odds in on Vin, or you could put the Hulk vs Chris Varick from Boiler Room.  I'm pretty sure we all know how that would end.  A more even match would have to be something like H.E.R.B.I.E. vs The Iron Giant or Rocket Racer vs Dominic Toretto in a race - but even then, I'm not too sure.
